mainSequence.step: User requests to display all data of an application
Display Application Data UI does Show
Display Application Data Controller fetches all applications
Application Repository returns Iterable of job applications
Display Application Data Controller sends List of job applications to UI
Display Application Data UI displays List of Applications to User
Display Application Data UI sends selected application to Controller
Display Application Data Controller fetches data for selected application
Application Repository returns job application data
Display Application Data Controller sends job application data to UI
Display Application Data UI displays Application Data to User
